docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''Debbie, let me tell you a story,'' said one of the steadily shrinking women. ''For the first time since I got on the program, I served my all-time favorite: Empire barbecued chicken. Before I served it, I was careful. I took the skin off. I wiped off the fat. But I really didn't enjoy it as much as I remembered.
